scripts.start: npx tspec generate --outputPath openapi.json --specPathGlobs ../routes/**/*.ts ; npx nodemon --trace-warnings
scripts.server: npx tspec generate --outputPath openapi.json --specPathGlobs ../routes/**/*.ts ; npx nodemon --trace-warnings
scripts.without: npx tspec generate --outputPath openapi.json --specPathGlobs ../routes/**/*.ts ; npx nodemon --trace-warnings
